data.text:
Several days later, I was visiting the 
Hanshin racecourse to spectate. When-
data.processed:
<story>Several days later, I was visiting the 
<story>Hanshin racecourse to spectate. When-

data.text:
No way, you're…! 
Waaa, that badge, so you're one of the school's trainers!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>No way, you're…! 
<story>Waaa, that badge, so you're one of the school's trainers!

data.text:
Ahahaa, "Your Highness" isn't needed! I'm Fine Motion, how do you 
do? Thank you very much for your help the other day!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaa, "Your Highness" isn't needed! I'm Fine Motion, how do you 
<story>do? Thank you very much for your help the other day!

data.text:
What a coincidence, are you watching the races too? …Oh, 
that's right, this is also an important part of being a trainer!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>What a coincidence, are you watching the races too? …Oh, 
<story>that's right, this is also an important part of being a trainer!

data.text: For me, too, today is - important as a spectator.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>For me, too, today is - important as a spectator.

data.text:
If it's fine with you, let's head this way! Actually, I woke up 
super early and got a good spot. Let's watch together!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>If it's fine with you, let's head this way! Actually, I woke up 
<story>super early and got a good spot. Let's watch together!

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOAAA!)
data.processed: <story>(WHOOOOOOOAAA!)

data.text:
They've entered the opposite straight, #1 in popularity, 
TM Opera O, in the middle! Air Shakur is in the 
back of the pack, and moves forward!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>They've entered the opposite straight, #1 in popularity, 
<story>TM Opera O, in the middle! Air Shakur is in the 
<story>back of the pack, and moves forward!

data.text: Heh…just watch…!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Heh…just watch…!

data.text: Shakur! Do your best!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Shakur! Do your best!

data.text:
Fine Motion was eagerly giving her all, frantically jumping up 
and down as she cheered Air Shakur on.
data.processed:
<story>Fine Motion was eagerly giving her all, frantically jumping up 
<story>and down as she cheered Air Shakur on.

data.text:
Shakur is a wonderful Uma Musume, you know? She's very 
clever…but tactless and will never give up on victory!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Shakur is a wonderful Uma Musume, you know? She's very 
<story>clever…but tactless and will never give up on victory!

data.text:
They round the 4th corner, finally reaching the final 
straight! Coming from the outside is #1 in popularity, 
TM Opera O! Will she pull through!?
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>They round the 4th corner, finally reaching the final 
<story>straight! Coming from the outside is #1 in popularity, 
<story>TM Opera O! Will she pull through!?

data.text:
No…! Make sure you get a good look! 
From here on, this is Shakur's spirit!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>No…! Make sure you get a good look! 
<story>From here on, this is Shakur's spirit!

data.text: ORAAAAAAA!!!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>ORAAAAAAA!!!

data.text:
Air Shakur! Air Shakur pulls forward! 
Subtly and steadily, Air Shakur pushes forward! First place is-
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Air Shakur! Air Shakur pulls forward! 
<story>Subtly and steadily, Air Shakur pushes forward! First place is-

data.text: Shakur…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Shakur…!

data.text: At that moment - I casually look to my side and realize.
data.processed: <story>At that moment - I casually look to my side and realize.

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOA!)
data.processed: <story>(WHOOOOOOOOOA!)

data.text:
Good work, Shakur! That last straight…that was an amazing 
drive. My heart is still racing!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Good work, Shakur! That last straight…that was an amazing 
<story>drive. My heart is still racing!

data.text: Tch… it only got me second, so it was pointless.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Tch… it only got me second, so it was pointless.

data.text:
That's true, for you it might have left you dissatisfied…but 
for me it was definitely, a heart-racing, magnificent run.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>That's true, for you it might have left you dissatisfied…but 
<story>for me it was definitely, a heart-racing, magnificent run.

data.text:
All the things you've built up, one by one, every 
single one of those things dazzlingly shines through… 
it's unspeakably wonderful.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>All the things you've built up, one by one, every 
<story>single one of those things dazzlingly shines through… 
<story>it's unspeakably wonderful.

data.text:
-Today also, will become a very important memory for me. 
Thank you, Shakur!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>-Today also, will become a very important memory for me. 
<story>Thank you, Shakur!

data.text: …yeah, sure.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>…yeah, sure.

data.text:
After all was said and done, I escorted Fine Motion back to 
school just in case- She was in high spirits the entire time.
data.processed:
<story>After all was said and done, I escorted Fine Motion back to 
<story>school just in case- She was in high spirits the entire time.

data.text:
Aaah, races are awesome! Shakur is awesome too! 
You saw it right? That thrilling last drive in the end!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Aaah, races are awesome! Shakur is awesome too! 
<story>You saw it right? That thrilling last drive in the end!

data.text:
I want to keep reliving that experience! 
At the start, like this, running while holding back-!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I want to keep reliving that experience! 
<story>At the start, like this, running while holding back-!

data.text: Ah, Your Highness!? Please wait-!
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed: <story>Ah, Your Highness!? Please wait-!

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa… not yet, not yet! 
Save your strength, and then…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa… not yet, not yet! 
<story>Save your strength, and then…!

data.text:
I was surprised when she suddenly took off but… more so than 
that, she displayed an unexpectedly splendid running form!
data.processed:
<story>I was surprised when she suddenly took off but… more so than 
<story>that, she displayed an unexpectedly splendid running form!

data.text:
Her form is a little rough, but on the other hand there seems to 
be some potential…And, maybe even more than that.
data.processed:
<story>Her form is a little rough, but on the other hand there seems to 
<story>be some potential…And, maybe even more than that.

data.text:
Haa, haa, and here…! 
Last, Spurt! Yaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, and here…! 
<story>Last, Spurt! Yaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
I can't pull my gaze away from Fine Motion's eyes. 
It's just that… she's-
data.processed:
<story>I can't pull my gaze away from Fine Motion's eyes. 
<story>It's just that… she's-

data.text: -having so much fun.
data.processed: <story>-having so much fun.

data.text:
Your Highness…! I-is something the matter?! 
Have you forgotten that sprinting at full 
speed has been strictly forbidden?!
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Your Highness…! I-is something the matter?! 
<story>Have you forgotten that sprinting at full 
<story>speed has been strictly forbidden?!

data.text:
Eh?…Ah! I'm deeply sorry! 
I… couldn't help myself.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Eh?…Ah! I'm deeply sorry! 
<story>I… couldn't help myself.

data.text: Ahaha… yeah, that's how it is.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Ahaha… yeah, that's how it is.

data.text:
From the start "Absolute Safety" was a condition of studying 
abroad. Things where there's a risk of getting hurt… and 
running in races, all of those are forbidden.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>From the start "Absolute Safety" was a condition of studying 
<story>abroad. Things where there's a risk of getting hurt… and 
<story>running in races, all of those are forbidden.

data.text: -But, I absolutely wanted to come to Tracen Academy for myself!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>-But, I absolutely wanted to come to Tracen Academy for myself!

data.text:
I wanted to be friends with, and speak with… all those girls 
around my age that were giving their all to chase their dreams.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I wanted to be friends with, and speak with… all those girls 
<story>around my age that were giving their all to chase their dreams.

data.text:
Things like that, will become my treasure… It will become an 
important experience, with regards to fulfilling my duty.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Things like that, will become my treasure… It will become an 
<story>important experience, with regards to fulfilling my duty.

data.text:
The weight of the words she casually spoke, unconsciously gave me 
pause. This amiable, innocent girl…she's still-
data.processed:
<story>The weight of the words she casually spoke, unconsciously gave me 
<story>pause. This amiable, innocent girl…she's still-

data.text:
A member of the Royal Family, saddled with 
a heavy duty to bear from birth.
data.processed:
<story>A member of the Royal Family, saddled with 
<story>a heavy duty to bear from birth.

data.text:
Fufuu, I'm glad Japan is such a safe place! 
It probably played a big part in persuading my father and family.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, I'm glad Japan is such a safe place! 
<story>It probably played a big part in persuading my father and family.

data.text:
I made friends, got to go to the stores I wanted to, and even got 
to spectate a few races at such a good place.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I made friends, got to go to the stores I wanted to, and even got 
<story>to spectate a few races at such a good place.

data.text: -I can return home, fully satisfied!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>-I can return home, fully satisfied!

data.text: That was the word that unconsciously came out of my mouth.
data.processed: <story>That was the word that unconsciously came out of my mouth.

data.text: …eh?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>…eh?

data.text:
She laughed, saying she was fully satisfied. Just 
being able to come to the academy, just making friends, 
even though she couldn't run. But-

choices.text: Really, you're satisfied with only that…?
Really, you're satisfied with only that…?

data.processed:
<story>She laughed, saying she was fully satisfied. Just 
<story>being able to come to the academy, just making friends, 
<story>even though she couldn't run. But-

data.text:
Even though she said all that while laughing, 
her eyes weren't sparkling like before.
data.processed:
<story>Even though she said all that while laughing, 
<story>her eyes weren't sparkling like before.

data.text: Um… I-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Um… I-

data.text:
…Your Highness, you will catch a cold out here. 
Please return to your dorm.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>…Your Highness, you will catch a cold out here. 
<story>Please return to your dorm.

data.text:
In the end, her guard cut our conversation short so I couldn't 
speak with her more than that. But…somewhere in my heart, I 
already had my answer.
data.processed:
<story>In the end, her guard cut our conversation short so I couldn't 
<story>speak with her more than that. But…somewhere in my heart, I 
<story>already had my answer.

data.text: Hey…you got any idea what you're sticking your nose in to?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Hey…you got any idea what you're sticking your nose in to?

data.text:
Don't 'Eh' me with that stupid look on your face! 
…Ah, damnit.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Don't 'Eh' me with that stupid look on your face! 
<story>…Ah, damnit.

data.text: -Don't even try to help with such half-hearted resolve.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>-Don't even try to help with such half-hearted resolve.

data.text: That warning, sharply pierced my heart.
data.processed: <story>That warning, sharply pierced my heart.
